meta.@content: Example use of simple prototypes for building construction: Wall, Floor, Level and Building.
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: Each Floor cantains the current floor surface plus a ceiling surface for the floor immediately underneath. A Floor does not include exterior or interior wall polygons.

field.@appinfo: Identifying name for this Floor.
Description info for this construction.
single-value Coordinate node with dimension x=width y=height z=depth in meters
Appearance node with Material colors ImageTexture etc. for this construction.
Appearance node with Material colors ImageTexture etc. for this construction.
Whether sides are visible.
width of front side of floor aligned with local X axis.
height of vertical distance between floor and ceiling directly underneath aligned with local Y axis.
depth of horizontal side of floor aligned with local -Z axis.
Indicate whether initialization complete.

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: Each Wall contains exterior and interior walls.

field.@appinfo: Identifying name for this Wall.
Description info for this construction.
single-value Coordinate node with dimension x=width y=height z=depth in meters
Appearance node with Material colors ImageTexture etc. for this construction.
Appearance node with Material colors ImageTexture etc. for this construction.
Whether sides are visible.
width of horizontal side of wall aligned with local X axis.
height of Wall aligned with local Y axis.
depth of horizontal thickness of Wall aligned with local -Z axis.
Indicate whether initialization complete.

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: collection of a Floor and four Walls working in order up from lowest level (i.e. story) of the Building

field.@appinfo: Identifying name for this Level.
Description info for this construction.
contains single Floor node
contains single front Wall node
contains single right-side Wall node
contains single rear Wall node
contains single left-side Wall node
Calculated width of horizontal side of Level aligned with local X axis.
Calculated height of Level aligned with local Y axis.
Calculated depth of horizontal thickness of Level aligned with local -Z axis.
Indicate whether initialization complete.

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: Collect prototypes for levels floors and walls to create a simple Building.

field.@appinfo: Identifying name of this Building.
Description info for this construction.
whether or not to display author assist tools such as coordinate axes measuring grids etc.
compass direction in degrees of building X axis as seen when regarding front face of building pointing from left side to right side.
output rotation value calculated from xHeading as (0 1 0 xHeading * 2pi / 360)
example value: 120.30 E
example value: 20.45 N
contains array of Level nodes
Geometry for Roof positioned above topmost Level
height value for provided Roof geometry.
Calculated width of horizontal side of Building aligned with local X axis.
Calculated height of Building aligned with local Y axis.
Calculated depth of horizontal thickness of Building aligned with local -Z axis.
Indicate whether initialization complete.

Viewpoint.@description: Building, Level, Wall and Floor prototype examples. Next Viewpoints are calculated based on Building size.

@value: A set of example building prototype instances.
first level is ground story of building
second level of building has an open front Wall
test default values are null wall

-children.#comment: no frontWall, but still need null-node fieldValue to avoid CosmoPlayer crash
center of Box is at origin, so translate to get front left corner of Box at origin. Also adjust for roof overhang.
roof can be any geometry. a very simple roof is to re-Use initial Floor.
